name: Keerthi Peddireddy
title: Full‑Stack Engineer • Applied AI & ML
summary: Full‑stack software engineer with a passion for building secure, real‑time systems and a growing focus on applied AI and machine learning. From architecting FastAPI‑Kafka backends to deploying LLM‑based assistants and CNN models, I thrive at the intersection of infrastructure and intelligence. Curious, hands‑on, and impact‑driven—I enjoy turning complex data and models into practical, user‑facing tools that solve real problems.

bullets: Automated diagnostics with Python scripts for test data collection/reporting, cutting analysis time by 25%.
Validated embedded systems and integrated software‑driven testing tools; ensured compliance with quality standards.
Conducted functional, in‑circuit, and system‑level testing of electronic assemblies; improved fault isolation efficiency by 20%.
Leveraged Linux tools, oscilloscopes, and logic analyzers to identify anomalies; contributed to a 15% increase in first‑pass yield.
Built FastAPI microservices to automate ingestion of external lab results and integrate with EMR systems.
Extended Python parsing to handle new lab formats; added custom logic for flexibility.
Created FastAPI endpoints for efficient retrieval of processed lab data by internal systems.
Optimized SQLAlchemy queries and added Pydantic validation for scalable processing of large datasets.
Upgraded AWS Lambda functions and decoupled processing via SQS; added pytest and GitHub Actions for CI.
Developed secure REST APIs in FastAPI with JWT‑based RBAC for multi‑user healthcare systems.
Built async Kafka consumers (aiokafka) and managed topics with Confluent AdminClient for real‑time pipelines.
Developed modular React components; integrated via WebSockets and REST for real‑time UI updates.
Implemented Elasticsearch for blazing search + filtering; backed by PostgreSQL for durable queries.

projects.name: NovaRAG
projects.desc: Two‑service RAG app: .NET 8 API gateway for auth/metadata; Python FastAPI for AI. Uses MiniLM L6 v2, chunking, NumPy cosine, EF Core + SQLite, JWT.

projects.name: AI Research Assistant
projects.desc: Semantic search and contextual Q&A over PDFs/URLs. Embeddings via Transformers, vector store in FAISS, citation‑aware responses.

projects.name: Agentic AI Chatbot
projects.desc: Local conversational agent using microsoft/DialoGPT‑medium. Real‑time Gradio UI, tunable params, offline‑friendly.

projects.name: Brain Tumor Detection
projects.desc: CNN classifier on MRI scans with preprocessing + augmentation. Deployed via FastAPI + TensorFlow Serving; React frontend.
